mapper.select: SELECT id, menu, shop, price, recent_date as recentDate, times, rate, memo FROM lunches ORDER BY recentDate,rate,id
SELECT id, menu, shop, price, recent_date as recentDate, times, rate, memo FROM lunches WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lunches (menu, shop, price, recent_date, times, rate, memo) VALUES (#{menu}, #{shop}, #{price}, #{recentDate}, #{times}, #{rate}, #{memo})
mapper.update: UPDATE lunches SET menu = #{menu}, shop = #{shop},price = #{price},recent_date = #{recentDate}, times = #{times},rate = #{rate},memo = #{memo} WHERE id = #{id}
